üéØ Solve a Scramble

‚ÑπÔ∏è CDN Usage Notes

Important: CDN sources require the latest code to be pushed to GitHub first!
If you just modified worker_persistent.js, you need to commit and push before CDN testing.

How it works: This demo fetches the worker script from CDN and creates it via Blob URL to bypass CORS restrictions.

jsDelivr CDN: Fast, reliable, recommended for production. May take a few minutes to update after push.
GitHub Raw: Updates faster but may fail due to Content-Type (text/plain) restrictions.
Local: Direct loading, no CORS issues, best for development and immediate testing.

For your own applications, you can use the same Blob URL technique shown in this page's source code.

‚ö° Quick Test Suite

Run 4 test scrambles to verify CDN loading and persistent table reuse.
